sentences.english: Negotiations frequently turn ugly, with channels going dark as discussions fail.

sentences.english: After a few days, of ready to do sth we try again, still be to part on bad terms.

sentences.english: But this was against the union, the negotiations finally broke up.

sentences.english: The results also made up a new round of 50-year-old huff, two people.
sentences.chinese: 結果又惹起新一輪的爭持，兩人不歡而散。

sentences.english: She apologize to Lin Lin, the result is in discord.
sentences.chinese: 羅梅到琳琳家道歉，結果還是不歡而散。
